targets.expr: max(kube_namespace_labels{namespace="$namespace"})by(namespace)
time() - max(kube_deployment_created{namespace="$namespace",deployment="$name"})
max(kube_deployment_spec_replicas{deployment="$name",namespace="$namespace"})
max(kube_deployment_status_replicas_ready{deployment="$name",namespace="$namespace"})
max(kube_deployment_status_replicas_ready{deployment="$name",namespace="$namespace"}) / max(kube_deployment_spec_replicas{deployment="$name",namespace="$namespace"})

panels.description: Deployment 历史更新保留版本的数量

targets.expr: count(kube_resource_relationship{name="$name", namespace="$namespace", target_kind="ReplicaSet"}>0)

panels.title: ReplicaSet Count

targets.expr: kube_deployment_status_replicas_available{namespace="$namespace",deployment="$name"}/kube_deployment_spec_replicas{namespace="$namespace",deployment="$name"}
max(kube_deployment_spec_replicas{deployment="$name",namespace="$namespace"}) without (instance, pod)
max(kube_deployment_status_replicas{deployment="$name",namespace="$namespace"}) without (instance, pod)
min(kube_deployment_status_replicas_ready{deployment="$name",namespace="$namespace"}) without (instance, pod)
min(kube_deployment_status_replicas_available{deployment="$name",namespace="$namespace"}) without (instance, pod)
min(kube_deployment_status_replicas_updated{deployment="$name",namespace="$namespace"}) without (instance, pod)
min(kube_deployment_status_replicas_unavailable{deployment="$name",namespace="$namespace"}) without (instance, pod)

label_replace(
  max(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="ReplicaSet"}) by (created_by_name, uid, pod, pod_ip, node),
  "replicaset",
  "$1",
  "created_by_name",
  "(.+)"
) * on(replicaset) group_left() max(kube_replicaset_owner{namespace="$namespace",owner_kind="Deployment",owner_name="$name"}) by (replicaset)
sum(kube_pod_status_phase{namespace="$namespace"} * (kube_pod_status_phase{namespace="$namespace"} > 0)) by (uid, phase)
sum(kube_pod_status_ready{namespace="$namespace"} * (kube_pod_status_ready{namespace="$namespace"} > 0)) by (uid, condition)
time() - max(kube_pod_created{namespace="$namespace"}) by (uid)
sum(max(kube_pod_container_status_restarts_total{namespace="$namespace"}) by (uid, container)) by (uid)
ceil(sum(increase(eventer_events_error_total{namespace='$namespace', kind="Deployment", name="$name"}[1h])) by (kind, name, reason)) > 0

ceil(sum(label_replace(label_replace(group by (target_kind, target_name)(kube_resource_relationship{namespace="$namespace", kind="Deployment", name="$name"}>0), "name", "$1", "target_name", "(.*)"), "kind", "$1", "target_kind", "(.*)") * on(name, kind)  group_right() increase(eventer_events_error_total{namespace='$namespace'}[1h])) by (reason, kind, name)>0 or sum(group(label_replace(label_replace(label_replace(label_replace(group by (target_kind, target_name)(kube_resource_relationship{namespace="$namespace", kind="Deployment", name="$name"}>0), "name", "$1", "target_name", "(.*)"), "kind", "$1", "target_kind", "(.*)") * on(name, kind) group_right() kube_resource_relationship{namespace="$namespace"}>0, "name", "$1", "target_name", "(.*)"), "kind", "$1", "target_kind", "(.*)")) by (name, kind) * on(name, kind)  group_right() increase(eventer_events_error_total{namespace='$namespace'}[1h])) by (reason, kind, name))>0

group by (service) (label_replace(group by (name) (group by(target_name) (label_replace(group by(target_name) (kube_resource_relationship{namespace="$namespace", kind="Deployment", name="$name", target_kind="ReplicaSet"}>0), "name", "$1", "target_name", "(.*)") * on(name) group_right() group by (name, target_name)(kube_resource_relationship{namespace="$namespace", target_kind="Pod"}>0)) * on(target_name) group_right() kube_resource_relationship{kind="Endpoints", target_kind="Pod"}), "service", "$1", "name", "(.*)")>0) * on(service) group_right() group by (cluster_ip, uid, service) (kube_service_info{namespace="$namespace"})

group by (persistentvolumeclaim, storageclass, node, volumename) (group by (persistentvolumeclaim) (label_replace(group by (target_name) (kube_resource_relationship{namespace="$namespace", kind="Deployment", name="$name", target_kind="PersistentVolumeClaim"}>0), "persistentvolumeclaim", "$1", "target_name", "(.*)")) * on (persistentvolumeclaim) group_right() kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{namespace="$namespace"}) * on (persistentvolumeclaim) group_left() kube_persistentvolumeclaim_status_phase{phase="Bound", namespace="$namespace"}

sum(label_replace(
  max(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="ReplicaSet", pod_ip!=""}) by (created_by_name, uid, pod, pod_ip, node),
  "replicaset",
  "$1",
  "created_by_name",
  "(.+)"
) * on(replicaset) group_left() max(kube_replicaset_owner{namespace="$namespace",owner_kind="Deployment",owner_name="$name"}) by (replicaset)
* on(pod) group_right() sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory", namespace="$namespace"}) by (pod))

max(label_replace(
  max(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="ReplicaSet", pod_ip!=""}) by (created_by_name, uid, pod, pod_ip, node),
  "replicaset",
  "$1",
  "created_by_name",
  "(.+)"
) * on(replicaset) group_left() max(kube_replicaset_owner{namespace="$namespace",owner_kind="Deployment",owner_name="$name"}) by (replicaset)
* on(pod) group_right() sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory", namespace="$namespace"}) by (pod))

label_replace(
  max(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="ReplicaSet", pod_ip!=""}) by (created_by_name, uid, pod, pod_ip, node),
  "replicaset",
  "$1",
  "created_by_name",
  "(.+)"
) * on(replicaset) group_left() max(kube_replicaset_owner{namespace="$namespace",owner_kind="Deployment",owner_name="$name"}) by (replicaset)
* on(pod) group_right() max by(container, pod) (container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace="$namespace", container!="", image!="", container!="POD"})

max(label_replace(
  max(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="ReplicaSet", pod_ip!=""}) by (created_by_name, uid, pod, pod_ip, node),
  "replicaset",
  "$1",
  "created_by_name",
  "(.+)"
) * on(replicaset) group_left() max(kube_replicaset_owner{namespace="$namespace",owner_kind="Deployment",owner_name="$name"}) by (replicaset)
* on(pod) group_right() max by(container, pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits_memory_bytes{namespace="$namespace"}))by(container)

max(label_replace(
  max(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="ReplicaSet", pod_ip!=""}) by (created_by_name, uid, pod, pod_ip, node),

) * on(replicaset) group_left() max(kube_replicaset_owner{namespace="$namespace",owner_kind="Deployment",owner_name="$name"}) by (replicaset)
* on(pod) group_right() max by(container, pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests_memory_bytes{namespace="$namespace"}))by(container)

  max(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="ReplicaSet", pod_ip!=""}) by (created_by_name, uid, pod, pod_ip, node),

* on(pod) group_right() sum(container_spec_memory_limit_bytes{namespace="$namespace",container!=""}) by (pod))

panels.description: 用户级 CPU 消耗占整体 CPU 消耗量的比例

targets.expr:
avg(label_replace(
  max(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="ReplicaSet", pod_ip!=""}) by (created_by_name, uid, pod, pod_ip, node),
  "replicaset",
  "$1",
  "created_by_name",
  "(.+)"
) * on(replicaset) group_left() max(kube_replicaset_owner{namespace="$namespace",owner_kind="Deployment",owner_name="$name"}) by (replicaset)
* on(pod) group_right() (max(rate(container_cpu_user_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace",container!="",container!="POD"}[5m])) by (pod,container) / max(rate(container_cpu_user_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace",container!="",container!="POD"}[5m])+rate(container_cpu_system_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace",container!="",container!="POD"}[5m])) by (pod,container))) by (pod,container)

panels.title: CPU User Time(%)

targets.expr:
sum(label_replace(
  max(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="ReplicaSet", pod_ip!=""}) by (created_by_name, uid, pod, pod_ip, node),
  "replicaset",
  "$1",
  "created_by_name",
  "(.+)"
) * on(replicaset) group_left() max(kube_replicaset_owner{namespace="$namespace",owner_kind="Deployment",owner_name="$name"}) by (replicaset)
* on(pod) group_right() sum(container_sockets{namespace="$namespace",container!=""}) by (pod))

panels.description: The number of network errors including receiving and transmitting.

targets.expr:
sum(label_replace(
  max(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="ReplicaSet", pod_ip!=""}) by (created_by_name, uid, pod, pod_ip, node),
  "replicaset",
  "$1",
  "created_by_name",
  "(.+)"
) * on(replicaset) group_left() max(kube_replicaset_owner{namespace="$namespace",owner_kind="Deployment",owner_name="$name"}) by (replicaset)
* on(pod) group_right() (sum(container_network_receive_errors_total{namespace="$namespace"}) by (pod) + sum(container_network_transmit_errors_total{namespace="$namespace"}) by (pod)))

panels.title: Network Errors

targets.expr:
label_replace(
  max(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="ReplicaSet", pod_ip!=""}) by (created_by_name, uid, pod, pod_ip, node),
  "replicaset",
  "$1",
  "created_by_name",
  "(.+)"
) * on(replicaset) group_left() max(kube_replicaset_owner{namespace="$namespace",owner_kind="Deployment",owner_name="$name"}) by (replicaset)
* on(pod) group_right() max(rate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{namespace="$namespace"}[5m])) by (pod)
